Class GameController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.is25am22new.Controller.GameController
public class GameController extends Object
The GameController class is responsible for managing and controlling the flow of the game. It facilitates operations within the lobby, starts the game, manages players' actions, and executes core game functionality.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static enum 
    GameController.GameState
    Represents the possible states of the game.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • GameController

      public GameController()
      Creates a new GameController instance with a default Lobby. Initializes the game state to GameController.GameState.LOBBY, sets the game type from the lobby, and prepares an empty list of observers.

    • GameController

      public GameController(Lobby lobby)
      Creates a new GameController instance using the provided Lobby. Initializes the game state to GameController.GameState.LOBBY and sets the game type from the given lobby.
      Parameters:
      lobby - the lobby instance to use for initializing the game controller.

  • Method Details

    • isStarted

      public boolean isStarted()
      Returns whether the game has started.
      Returns:
      true if the game has started; false otherwise.

    • setStarted

      public void setStarted(boolean started)
      Sets the started status of the game.
      Parameters:
      started - true to indicate the game has started; false otherwise.

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      The main method responsible for initializing and starting the server components including the RMI server and Socket server. This method sets up the necessary configurations and begins execution of both servers in separate threads.
      Parameters:
      args - an array of command-line arguments where: args[0] specifies the hostname for the RMI server. args[1] specifies the port number to be used for the servers.

    • getLobbyState

      public String getLobbyState()
      Returns a string representation of the current lobby state, including players, the lobby creator, ready status, and game type.
      Returns:
      a formatted string with the current lobby information.

    • getLobbyCreator

      public String getLobbyCreator()
      Returns the username of the lobby creator.
      Returns:
      the lobby creator's name.

    • setNumPlayers

      public void setNumPlayers(int maxPlayers)
      Sets the maximum number of players allowed in the lobby. Can only be modified during the GameController.GameState.LOBBY phase.
      Parameters:
      maxPlayers - the maximum number of players.

    • addPlayer

      public int addPlayer(String player)
      Adds a player to the lobby if the game is in the GameController.GameState.LOBBY state. If the first player is added, they are automatically set as the lobby creator.
      Parameters:
      player - the name of the player to add.
      Returns:
      1 if successfully added, -1 if lobby is full, -2 if player already exists, or -1 if not in lobby state.

    • removePlayer

      public int removePlayer(String player)
      Removes a player from the lobby if the game is in the GameController.GameState.LOBBY state. If the lobby becomes empty, the game is reinitialized. If the removed player was the creator, a new one is assigned.
      Parameters:
      player - the name of the player to remove.
      Returns:
      1 if successfully removed, 0 if player not found, or -1 if not in lobby state.

    • setPlayerReady

      public void setPlayerReady(String player)
      Marks a player as ready in the lobby. Can only be called during the GameController.GameState.LOBBY phase.
      Parameters:
      player - the name of the player to mark as ready.

    • startGameByHost

      public boolean startGameByHost(String player)
      Starts the game if the player is the lobby creator and the game is still in the lobby state. This typically transitions the game to the active state.
      Parameters:
      player - the name of the player attempting to start the game.
      Returns:
      true if the game was started, false otherwise.

    • setPlayerNotReady

      public void setPlayerNotReady(String player)
      Marks a player as not ready in the lobby. Can only be used during the GameController.GameState.LOBBY phase.
      Parameters:
      player - the name of the player to mark as not ready.

    • setGameType

      public void setGameType(String gameType)
      Sets the type of game to be played. This can only be modified during the GameController.GameState.LOBBY phase.
      Parameters:
      gameType - the type of game (e.g., "standard", "advanced") to be set.

    • loadGame

      public boolean loadGame()
      Loads a previously saved game state and resumes it if all lobby players match.
      Returns:
      true if the game was successfully loaded and resumed, false otherwise.

    • pickCoveredTile

      public void pickCoveredTile(String player)
      Allows a player to pick a covered tile during the game. This action is synchronized to avoid race conditions.
      Parameters:
      player - the nickname of the player picking the tile.

    • pickUncoveredTile

      public void pickUncoveredTile(String player, String tilePngName)
      Allows a player to pick an uncovered tile during the game. This action is synchronized to avoid race conditions.
      Parameters:
      player - the nickname of the player.
      tilePngName - the name of the image/tile to pick.

    • rotateClockwise

      public void rotateClockwise(String player, int rotationNum)
      Rotates a player's current tile clockwise a specified number of times.
      Parameters:
      player - the nickname of the player.
      rotationNum - number of 90-degree rotations to perform.

    • rotateCounterClockwise

      public void rotateCounterClockwise(String player, int rotationNum)
      Rotates a player's current tile counterclockwise a specified number of times.
      Parameters:
      player - the nickname of the player.
      rotationNum - number of 90-degree rotations to perform.

    • placeAstronauts

      public void placeAstronauts(String nickname, int i, int j)
      Places astronauts on the ship grid at the specified coordinates.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the name of the player.
      i - the row index.
      j - the column index.

    • placeBrownAlien

      public void placeBrownAlien(String nickname, int i, int j)
      Places a brown alien at the given grid position.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the name of the player.
      i - the row index.
      j - the column index.

    • placePurpleAlien

      public void placePurpleAlien(String nickname, int i, int j)
      Places a purple alien at the given grid position.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the name of the player.
      i - the row index.
      j - the column index.

    • weldComponentTile

      public void weldComponentTile(String player, int i, int j)
      Welds a component tile onto the ship at the given coordinates.
      Parameters:
      player - the nickname of the player.
      i - the row index.
      j - the column index.

    • standbyComponentTile

      public void standbyComponentTile(String player)
      Sends the currently selected tile into standby mode.
      Parameters:
      player - the nickname of the player.

    • pickStandByComponentTile

      public void pickStandByComponentTile(String player, int index)
      Picks a tile from the player's standby list based on the index.
      Parameters:
      player - the nickname of the player.
      index - the index of the tile to pick.

    • discardComponentTile

      public void discardComponentTile(String player)
      Discards the currently selected component tile.
      Parameters:
      player - the nickname of the player

    • finishBuilding

      public void finishBuilding(String player)
      Marks the player's shipboard as finished building.
      Parameters:
      player - the nickname of the player

    • finishBuilding

      public void finishBuilding(String player, int pos)
      Marks the player's shipboard as finished and selects a flight board position.
      Parameters:
      player - the nickname of the player
      pos - the position on the flight board

    • finishedAllShipboards

      public void finishedAllShipboards()
      Notifies that all players have finished building their shipboards.

    • flipHourglass

      public void flipHourglass()
      Flips the hourglass timer during the building phase.

    • pickCard

      public void pickCard()
      Picks the next adventure card from the deck.

    • activateCard

      public void activateCard(InputCommand inputCommand)
      Activates the currently drawn adventure card using the input command.
      Parameters:
      inputCommand - the command from the player to activate the card

    • playerAbandons

      public void playerAbandons(String player)
      Allows a player to abandon the game.
      Parameters:
      player - the nickname of the player

    • destroyTile

      public void destroyTile(String player, int i, int j)
      Destroys a tile from the player's ship grid.
      Parameters:
      player - the nickname of the player
      i - row index
      j - column index

    • setCurrPlayer

      public void setCurrPlayer(String player)
      Sets the current player for the turn.
      Parameters:
      player - the nickname of the player

    • setCurrPlayerToLeader

      public void setCurrPlayerToLeader()
      Sets the current player to the leader (first to finish building).

    • endGame

      public Map<String,Integer> endGame()
      Ends the game and returns the final scores.
      Returns:
      a map from player nickname to their final score

    • reinitializeGame

      public void reinitializeGame()
      Resets the game and lobby to initial state.

    • getGame

      public Game getGame()
      Returns the current Game object if in GAME state.
      Returns:
      the current game or null if not in game state

    • getCardPiles

      public List<CardPile> getCardPiles()
      Returns the current list of card piles.
      Returns:
      list of card piles or null if not in game state

    • getDeck

      public List<AdventureCard> getDeck()
      Returns the current deck of adventure cards.
      Returns:
      list of cards or null if not in game state

    • getCurrCard

      public AdventureCard getCurrCard()
      Returns the currently drawn adventure card.
      Returns:
      the current card or null if not in game state

    • getLastPlayer

      public String getLastPlayer()
      Returns the last player who performed an action.
      Returns:
      the nickname of the last player or null if not in game state

    • getPlayers

      public List<String> getPlayers()
      Returns the list of players in the lobby or current game.
      Returns:
      the list of player nicknames or null if invalid state

    • getReadyStatus

      public Map<String,Boolean> getReadyStatus()
      Returns the ready status of all players in the lobby.
      Returns:
      a map from nickname to ready status, or null if not in lobby

    • getGameType

      public String getGameType()
      Returns the selected game type from the lobby.
      Returns:
      the game type or null if not in lobby

    • getCurrentState

      public GameController.GameState getCurrentState()
      Returns the current controller state.
      Returns:
      the current game state

    • getObservers

      public List<ObserverModel> getObservers()
      Returns the list of observers for UI updates.
      Returns:
      list of observers

    • updateAllLobbies

      public void updateAllLobbies()
      Notifies all observers to update the lobby UI.

    • updateAllGameStarted

      public void updateAllGameStarted()
      Notifies all observers that the game has started.

    • updateAllPlayerJoined

      public void updateAllPlayerJoined(String player)
      Notifies all observers that a player has joined.
      Parameters:
      player - the nickname of the player who joined

    • godMode

      public void godMode(String player, String conf)
      Enables a special debug/game manipulation mode.
      Parameters:
      player - the nickname of the player
      conf - the configuration string

    • quit

      public void quit(String player)
      Removes a player from the game, or shuts down if last player.
      Parameters:
      player - the nickname of the quitting player

    • disconnect

      public void disconnect()
      Disconnects and shuts down all observers and the application.
